obj.name: Desk
obj.action: print:You rummage through your desk, and find your house key.+give:house_key
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through your desk again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Cupboard
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the
obj.action_dia: You open the creaky door of your cupboard, and find your old red hat. You don the hat, feeling more at home already.
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through your cupboard again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Bed
obj.verbs: gen/lie on/sit on/rest on/rest/lie upon/sleep on

obj.name: Magic Portal
obj.action_dia: you move through the magic portal
obj.item_dia: you try and go through, but it doesnt exist yet
